title: Define Project Architecture
description: Develop a high-level architecture for the RedSmartGrid project that outlines how the system will be structured and interact.

title: Design Smart Meter Integration
description: Develop a design for integrating smart meters into the RedSmartGrid system.

title: Implement Energy Optimization Algorithms
description: Develop and implement algorithms that optimize energy distribution in the RedSmartGrid system.

title: Create User Interface for Grid Management
description: Design and develop the user interface for managing the RedSmartGrid system, including options for monitoring and controlling energy distribution.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create technical documentation that outlines the RedSmartGrid system design and implementation details.

title: Review Technical Documentation (RFC)
description: Review and provide feedback on the technical documentation for the RedSmartGrid project.
